metadata.title: Tuesday, 8th December, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    what measures the Government has taken to ensure that all children achieve primary education by December, 2015, in accordance with Millennium Development Goal (MDG) No. 2; and
(b)    what challenges the Government has encountered in achieving the MDG.

questions.minister: Minister of General Education when a secondary school will be constructed in Ngabwe District.
